Author: liblobapp
Title: Boomr Token Sale - Live
Body: Boomr Token Sale[/size]  The Boomr Token (BMR) is now available for purchase (https://boomrtoken.com). The BMR is created for https://liblob.com, a p2p and b2c adventure sporting goods and services.

Author: Diarcou
Title: Boomr Token Sale - Live
Body: Is there any bounty or airdrop?

Author: liblobapp
Title: Boomr Token Sale - Live
Body: We will be conducting an AirDrop of 5,000,000 BMR after a successful token sale (min. cap reached). The AirDrop would happen around May 2018, and requires a minimum of 0.1 ETH and a wallet which accepts ERC20 tokens.  For the bounty, we will also be offering a max bounty of 5,000,000 BMR. Requirements are below:  1) Facebook - 1,500,000 BMR Posts regarding Boomr Token Sale or featuring Boomr Token Sale: 500+ friends: 5 BMR 2,000+ friends: 10 BMR 5,000+ friends: 25 BMR 10,000+ friends: 50 BMR 25,000+ friends: 100 BMR  To Particpate: 1: Like our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/LibLobApp/ 2: Make a thoughtful post about the Boomr Token Sale, and tag our Facebooke page (@liblobapp). 3: You must have a minimum of 500 friends. 4: Your Facebook account must not be fake, inactive or a bot account. Only original Facebook accounts will be accepted. 5: You must be an active and regular Facebook user, and must be sharing and liking LibLob's official posts and updates. 6: Account must be open as a Public Profile and all Posts shared need to be public as well. 7: Multiple accounts are not allowed. Those found using such multi accounts will be disqualified and blacklisted from any and all future campaigns. 8: Maximum of 3 posts a week.  2) Twitter - 1,500,000 BMR Tweets regarding Boomr Token Sale or featuring Boomr Token Sale: 500+ followers: 5 BMR 2,000+ followers: 10 BMR 5,000+ followers: 25 BMR 10,000+ followers: 50 BMR 25,000+ followers: 100 BMR Each 5 re-tweets: 1 BMR  To Particpate: 1: Follow us https://twitter.com/liblobapp 2: Make a thoughtful tweet about the Boomr Token Sale, and tag our Twitter account (@liblobapp). 3: You must have a minimum of 500 followers. 4: Your Twitter account must not be fake, inactive or a bot account. Only original Twitter accounts will be accepted. 5: You must be an active and regular Twitter user, and must be sharing and liking LibLob's official posts and updates. 6: Account must be open as a Public Profile and all Posts shared need to be public as well. 7: Multiple accounts are not allowed. Those found using such multi accounts will be disqualified and blacklisted from any and all future campaigns. 8: Maximum of 3 tweets a week.  3) Reddit - 1,000,000 BMR Posts regarding Boomr Token Sale or featuring Boomr Token Sale: 10 upvotes: 5 BMR 20 upvotes: 10 BMR 50 upvotes: 20 BMR 100 upvotes: 50 BMR 300 upvotes: 100 BMR  To Particpate: 1: Your account should be at least 30 days old and have 10 posts or comment karma. 2: Mention/tag r/LibLob 3: Send post link to info@liblob.com.  4) Blogs/News - 1,000,000 BMR Articles, Blogs, and Reviews regarding Boomr Token or featuring Boomr Token Sale: Good Quality Article: 150BMR Thorough Review: 100BMR  To Participate: 1: Low Quality Articles and Reviews will not be Accepted, 2: Articles and Reviews must represent original work. Copying other's work is not allowed and will result in a disqualification. You can use Official Images, Artworks and other Content posted on the Website. 3: In the Description of the Article AND in Article Content you must have one link to the LibLob official website, one link pointing to the Boomr Token Sale website, and one link of your own bitcointalk and/or reddit profile to prove it is original content (your link can go in comment section if desired). 4: Article should exceed 500 Characters, less than 500 Characters will not be accepted. 5: Medium, Steemit, Newbium, and other general/free blogging platforms submissions will be accepted, but only One per User. 6: If the article is posted on a website, podcast or blog that has quality content, then 3 submissions will be accepted.(Examples such as Personal Blogs with Active Users, Cointelegraph, Popular YouTube Channels and so on) 7: Send links to article/blog post to info@liblob.com.   The rules, participation, and amounts are subject to change if necessary.

Author: liblobapp
Title: Boomr Token Sale - Live
Body: UPDATE  In accordance with our whitepaper, we have now set the price of the BMR to approximately 0.000214 ETH, or ~$0.24. This is to ensure the token sale can continue for the next four (4) weeks.  Beginning at 0001 GMT 08 January, a 15% discount will be in place. This will be decreased to a 10% discount on 15 January. The BMR can be purchased from the contract address 0x300A0A820d8FB6E77850DA5eaa8dF64bBfF5746D.
